remarks: The vectors (vector base set) of the constructed full vector space H are all translations (for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` ).  (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhvbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhvbase.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvbase.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvbase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvbase.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dvhvbase $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> V = ( T X. E ) ) $.
